card_name: Not as Dead as We Thought
rules_text: Choose target creature card in your graveyard. If returning it to the battlefield would give you a larger sentai, or if you already have a full sentai, return it to the battlefield. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
notes: FUS — Also :WB: isn't a sentai archetype, but I'm down with sentai bystander being a sub theme of WB to test.
